nodes.text: Kadok III was a star located in the Tertiary Kadok system, a part of the Kadok Regions in Wild Space. It was orbited by five planets.

The innermost, Kadok III-A, was a searing-hot rock world with eight moons of its own. The second orbit was occupied by another searing rock planet, Kadok III-B, which had fifteen natural satellites. Kadok III-C, a barren rock planet with a single moon, occupied the third orbital position around its star.

Further out, Kadok III-D, commonly known as Guiteica, was a temperate terrestrial world with mountains, glaciers, forests, and huge waterfalls on its surface. It was the homeworld of the j'kuutak and roggwart creatures as well as the sentient Bitthævrian species. The outermost orbit around Kadok III was occupied by the gas giant–type planet Kadok III-E and its seventy-five moons.

Kadok III was mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tertiary Kadok system, and therefore Kadok III, in grid square J-4.
